00138   int getSpan() const { 
00139     if (gr1.chr == gr2.chr)
00140       return abs(gr1.pos1-gr2.pos1);
00141     else
00142       return -1;
00143   }

00175   // define how to sort these 
00176   bool operator < (const BreakPoint& bp) const { 
00177     return (gr1 < bp.gr1); // || (gr1 == gr2 && nsplit1 > bp.nsplit1)
00178     //(bp.gr1.ref == refID1 && bp.pos1 > pos1) || // low pos is first
00179       //  (bp.refID1 == refID1 && bp.pos1 == pos1 && bp.pos2 == pos2 && nsplit1 > bp.nsplit1) || // if same, check nsplit
00180       // (bp.refID1 == refID1 && bp.pos1 == pos1 && bp.pos2 == pos2 && nsplit1 == bp.nsplit1 && tsplit1 > bp.tsplit1); // if also same, check tsplit
00181   }
00182   friend ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& out, const BreakPoint& bp) { out << bp.toString(); return out; }
